gggda package

Source: R/gggda.r
gggda.Rd

This is a ggplot2 extension for multivariate and geometric data analysis.

Acknowledgments

This package was spun off from ordr. Many users have identified problems and suggested improvements.

Development benefitted from the use of equipment and the support of colleagues at UConn Health and at UF Health.

See also
